00089 /****************************************************************************************************/
00090 // Class Specification
00091 
00096 class TTElement {
00097 public:
00098         static const TTFloat32 kTTLookupEqualPower[];                   
00099         static const TTFloat32 kTTLookupHalfPaddedwWelch[];             
00100         static const TTFloat32 kTTLookupQuarterSine[];                  
00101         static const TTFloat64 kTTPi;                                                   
00102         static const TTFloat64 kTTTwoPi;                                                
00103         static const TTFloat64 kTTAntiDenormalValue;                    
00104         static const TTFloat64 kTTSqrt2;                                                
00105 
00107         TTElement();
00108         
00110         virtual ~TTElement();
00111         
00113         TTFloat64               antiDenormal(TTFloat64 value);
00114         
00116         void                    logMessage(char *message);
00118         void                    logError(char *message);
00119         
00121         static TTInt32  round(TTFloat32 value);
00123         static TTInt32  round(TTFloat64 value);
00124         
00125         
00127         template<class T>
00128         static T TTElement::clip(T value, T low_bound, T high_bound)
00129         {
00130                 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00131                         value = T(((fabs(value - low_bound)) + (low_bound + high_bound)) - fabs(value - high_bound));
00132                 #else   // VC++ gens an ERROR because of the ambiguous call to fabs().  This is annoying...
00133                         value = T(((fabs(double(value - low_bound))) + (low_bound + high_bound)) - fabs(double(value - high_bound)));
00134                 #endif
00135                 value /= 2;             // relying on the compiler to optimize this, chosen to reduce compiler errors in Xcode
00136                 return value;
00137         }
00138 
00140         template<class T>
00141         static T TTElement::limit_max(T value, T high_bound)
00142         {
00143                 value = high_bound - value;
00144                 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00145                         value += fabs(value);
00146                 #else
00147                         value += fabs((double)value);
00148                 #endif
00149                 value *= 0.5;
00150                 value = high_bound - value;
00151                 return value; 
00152         }
00153 
00156         template<class T>
00157         static T TTElement::limit_min(T value, T low_bound)
00158         {
00159                 value -= low_bound;
00160                 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00161                         value += fabs(value);
00162                 #else
00163                         value += fabs((double)value);
00164                 #endif
00165                 value *= 0.5;
00166                 value += low_bound;
00167                 return value; 
00168         }
00169 
00172         template<class T>
00173         static T TTElement::onewrap(T value, T low_bound, T high_bound)
00174         {
00175                 if((value >= low_bound) && (value < high_bound)) 
00176                         return value;
00177                 else if(value >= high_bound)
00178                         return((low_bound - 1) + (value - high_bound)); 
00179                 else
00180                         return((high_bound + 1) - (low_bound - value));
00181         }
00182 
00184         template<class T>
00185         static T TTElement::scale(T value, T inlow, T inhigh, T outlow, T outhigh)
00186         {
00187                 double inscale, outdiff;
00188                  
00189                 inscale = 1 / (inhigh - inlow);
00190                 outdiff = outhigh - outlow;
00191                 
00192                 value = (value - inlow) * inscale;
00193                 value = (value * outdiff) + outlow;
00194                 return(value);                                                                                  
00195         }
00196         
00197 };
